title: DEALS OF THE WEEK: Get 20% off kitchenware, a free chocolate box and discounts on beeswax wraps
text:
Get up to 20 per cent off kitchenware and home accessories with the big autumn savings event at Lakeland this month. Visit Lakeland.co.uk.

Buy sustainable beeswax wraps to preserve leftover food with free delivery on orders over £50 and a 10 per cent discount code when you subscribe to emails. Visit beeswaxwraps.co.uk/newsletter-sign-up.

Treat yourself to a free Seasonal Selection chocolate box with Thorntons when you spend £30 or more using promotional code FWYS30

Access free worldwide wi-fi with Boingo when you top up a Travelex Money Card. You must register for a Boingo account within 12 months of getting the card. Visit travelex.co.uk/travel-money-card/platinum-benefits.

Treat yourself to a free Seasonal Selection chocolate box with Thorntons when you spend £30 or more using promotional code FWYS30. Visit thorntons.co.uk.

Trade in an old dash cam or satnav of any make or model and receive 20 per cent off the cost of any new Nextbase Dash Cam. Deal available until November 18. Visit halfords.com/advice/technology/buyers-guides/techtrade-in.
description: This week's deals include: 20 per cent off kitchenware and home accessories with Lakeland; a free Seasonal Selection chocolate box with Thorntons and much more.
authors: Laura Shannon For The Mail On Sunday
